metadata.synopsis: Shadowheart is afraid of wolves due her belief that she was being chased by one in her childhood. Should this be revealed to the party after it was triggered, or if Shadowheart by herself she will further relect on it.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Get close to a hostile wolf on Shadowheart2. Finish combat and wait for VB to play.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: I didn't realise you were frightened of wolves, Shadowheart.

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: Everyone's frightened of something. My fear's hardly irrational, when you see the fangs on those things.
0.context: NodeContext: A little shaken after an encounter with a wolf. Refers to a childhood encounter when she believes she was saved from a wolf by Shar worshippers (later, she may realise this was a lie and lose the phobia) Arc - SH is loyal to Shar.

2.speaker: Shadowheart
2.text: Blasted wolves. They always make me feel like that scared little girl all over again...
